list.description: Для танков с очень хорошей балистикой
Слава Україні

#sight #type74 #type_74
[UPDATE 28/05/2022 - fixed misalignments & MG distance lines removed]
Basically just fixed the border around the distance text (which got misaligned with last update) and removed the distance lines for MG because for some reason they're not working

Sight will work for all variants except the new Type 74C

Also all the blocks for MG still are there (they're just set to that the game won't read them), so anyone with higher skill of sight coding has the opportunity to play around and try to fix it

Distance fire system : Linear
Supported ammuniti...

SIGHT IS FOR 1440p

Adaptation of _ZoliWorks_ 's M1A1 sight. Round type in the sight has been set to M829A1. This also has the placement of the ranging result fixed unlike the original sights by ZoliWorks. Still _ZoliWorks_ work just minor modification/updates by me. I have also re-upload all the other M1 series sights with fixed ranging placement.

See here for original creator and sights: https://live.warthunder.com/user/_ZoliWorks_/

#m1a1_hc #m1a1hc #m1a1hc_abrams #m1a1hcabrams #sight #1440p

#sight #m60 #m60_patton #m60patton #m_60 #m_60_patton
[UPDATE 27/11/2022 - fixed distance stretches]
Radial gunsight for the M60. Okay so we've already had a radial gunsight for the Leopard 1, Centurion Mk. 3, and now to conclude this radial-L7-odyssey (the Centurion Mk. 3 actually doesn't use the L7 but shhh), here it is for the M60

The small distance arc (with lines) sets distance for HESH, currently set distance is displayed above the "M393A2 (HESH)" text
The medium distance arc sets distance for HEATFS, currently set distance is displayed above the "M456 (HEATFS)" text
...

[UPDATE 09/10/2021 - inscriptions can now be illuminated]
Gunsight for the Churchill Mk. VII from Girls und Panzer

The right distance lines are for the M61 (APCBC) shell, the left ones (with no number marking) are for the coaxial MG, and the lines are for 400, 800, 1200 and 1600 meters

Skin by @_RoriSpitter_ (https://live.warthunder....

file.name: Churchill Mk. VII St. Gloriana Gunsight GuP.zip

list.description:
#help A sight for the new #bmd_4 that has markers for both HE rounds, coax, and the 30mm autocannon (not working - thus the plea for help).
I want the 30mm to show up on the right just like the HE, I have everything set up already but am unsure on what "speed" to use as it is mixed belts, and if it needs to be labeled as coax or anything. The HEF-T and HEF-I go 960 m/s, AP-T goes 970 m/s, and the APDS goes 1120 m/s. Unfortunately, the WIKI does not have everything on making sights, ran into the same problem with the french AMX-30 and it's 20mm, but the solution I had for that does not work he...

STB-1 Fictional Gunner Sight

Can't believe no one made a sight yet for the best tank in the game (relative to it's BR). So here I made a quick clean sight.

  • White light reticles always on
  • I may improve this in the future
  • I'll make a version for Type 74 so look out for it

#stb1

#sight #m41 #m41a1 #m41_walker_bulldog #m41a1_walker_bulldog #m41walkerbulldog #m41_walker_bulldog #m41_a1
[UPDATE 20/11/2022 - Sabot ballistics guidance fixed & inscriptions re-aligned]
Two-thirds radial gunsight for the M41A1 (there are 3 distance sets and only 2 are radial so two-thirds)

The outer distance arc (with circles) sets distance for APDS, the inner one (with lines) sets distance for AP. Also, a standard line system is in the left for the coaxial MG.

APDS and AP also have 0° armor penetration for 10, 100 and 500 meters displayed beneath the "Sabot" and "AP" inscripti...

#sight #bmp #bmp_2 #bmp_2m #bmp_2_m #bmp2 #bmp2m #bmp2_m
[UPDATE 29/11/2022 - removed everything useless & fixed misalignments]
"Kolya" gunsight for the BMP-2M. I just like to call it "Kolya" with no apparent reason for it

The measured distance is displayed in the "DISTANCE" window, and currently set firing distance is displayed in the "CORRECTION" window. Those 2 long lines show approximate trajectory of the ATGMs until they reach the sight center. However, it is important whether you use the barrel view or gunner optics view, as the trajectory is different depending on whi...

#sight #type61 #type_61
[UPDATE 09/10/2021 - inscriptions can now be illuminated & fixed distance font scale bug]
Gunsight for the type 61

For this sight, distance adjusting doesn't move the gun, but moves the 4 triangles on the horizontal line and the central arrow. As you move them up or down, the triangles and arrow align with the distance lines of the certain shell. All the shells have distance lines up to 3000 meters, and available shell trajectories are for M431 HEATFS shell, M82 APCBC shell, M313 smoke shell and coaxial MG

Illuminated gunsight is bright green instead of r...

Sight for BMD-4 , easier to lauch grenades.
Including 3OF32 and 3OF70.

BMD-4 gunner sight. Semi historical

have a nice game with VDV !

#bmd4

#sight for the #british #fv_4005 with dynamic #rangefinder

IMPORTANT
For the dynamic rangefinder to work properly you must have Mouse Wheel set to Sight Distance Control with a multiplier of 52%

DESCTIPTION
#modern style sight which shows two bracket lines which close in towards the boresight as you increase Sight Distance Control, once the tank you are aiming at fits within the closing brackets you can fire with 100% accuracy.

#sight for the #british #centurion_avre #avre with dynamic #rangefinder

IMPORTANT
For the dynamic rangefinder to work properly you must have Mouse Wheel set to Sight Distance Control with a multiplier of 52%

DESCTIPTION
#modern style sight which shows two bracket lines which close in towards the boresight as you increase Sight Distance Control, once the tank you are aiming at fits within the closing brackets you can fire with 100% accuracy.

Sights for StuG III A, StuH 42 G, StuG III F, StuG III G, (Italian) StuG III G, Panzer IV/70(V), IS-2, (Chinese) IS-2, IS-2 №402 and QF 3.7 Ram for simulator battles.

#sight #alltanks
This is a simple modern sight that works with all tanks in the game but i recommend using it only for top tier because that's what it's designed for


To download
just extract the zip file and drop the sight_1.blk file in Steam\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks

i hope you like it :)

If you would like to know how sim sights work, visit this:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/971966/en/

#kv2 #kv_2 #кв2 #кв_2 #mc #minecraft

Got rid of unnecessary lines, made the lines thinner, made range finder numbers closer, and move the range numbers next to the lines instead of half the screen away. Short range only, works for all tanks. :)


Green, Cyan, Red and Black colors available :)


twitch.tv/ImJeffafa :)

Install:
Unzip the UserSights.zip file and drag the UserSights Folder into your WT directory

#sight #sights #crosshair #simple #ImJeffafa

Gunsight switched with a 1964 television for the T-72AV TURMS-T. You probably already noticed that I love sights with shrinked FOV. Here it is also shrinked, but in a slightly unusual way... I thought it will look cool

Good luck using unzoomed gunner view with this sight

Distance lines automatically adapt to different shell velocities

#panther #tiger #tiger_ii #m1abrams #type90 #leopard #ztz99 #ztz #ztz96 #type59

#sight #is7 #is_7 #semihistorical #semi_historical
The upper arc sets distance for the BR-482B (APCBC-HE), the lower one does so for the OF-482M (HE), both can go up to 6000 meters . Although both of those shells have truly and literally the same muzzle velocity and trajectory (so you can just use both arcs independently on the shell that is loaded)

Also, the 12,7mm KPVT MG has a standard distance lines system on the left, but for some reason it can't go over 1200 meters even if it is more in the sight code >_<

Illuminated sight is not less red than the october revolution was (sorry)

#sight #is2 #is2_44 #is21944 #is2_1944 #is_2 #is_2_1944 #is_2_44 #semihistorical #semi_historical #stadiametric
[UPDATE 09/10/2021 - inscriptions can be now illuminated & fixed font scale bug]
Gunsight for the IS-2 1944 with arc distance setting feat. stadiometric rangefinder optimized for 2.8 meters

(Yes I noticed that Jagdtiger on the photo doesn't truly align with the rangefinder lines, but that's because the
Jagdtiger's chassis is slightly covered from any angle you look at it in the test drive)
Also, keep in mind that the rangefinder works correctly with UNZOOMED gunner vi...
